title: Protests erupt in Tehran
summary: Large crowds gathered in Argentina Square following the death of Mahsa Amini.

title: Funeral ceremony in Saqqez
summary: Security forces reportedly intervened during the funeral ceremony.

title: University students join strikes
summary: Students from multiple universities across the country refused to attend classes.

title: Internet disruptions reported
summary: NetBlocks confirmed significant internet outages in Kurdistan province.

title: Global solidarity rallies
summary: Protests were held in major cities around the world in support of Iranian people.
